issue.title: [R] Implement bindings for stringr::str_remove and stringr::str_remove_all
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14832](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14832). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://stringr.tidyverse.org/reference/str_remove.html explains that it is an alias for str_replace with "".
